Class BoggleView

java.lang.Object
views.BoggleView
All Implemented Interfaces:

public class BoggleView extends Object implements Serializable
Boggle View This is The class that displays boggle.

    • size

      int size
      Grid size (4 -9). The grid is always a square therefore the size is only an integer. GridButtonSize is the size of the grid buttons Font is the font for the buttons
